title: The Ugly Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Details (Ep 1658)
description:
In this episode I address the new developments in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. I also address the real reasons behind the Omicron fear campaign. 

News Picks:

Wait, there were more flights to Epstein Island?


More grotesque details emerge in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. 


GOP senators threaten to shut down the government to protect us against the immoral vaccine mandates. 

Biden to announce more ridiculous restricting due to Omicron.

Judge moves to halt the immoral vaccine mandates.


Five collusion lies the media must apologize for.
